text: Læa cng raluk thung reuxngraw khxng san nun (nbi yu nus) meux khea cak pi dwy khwam korth phrrkhphwk khxng khea læw khea khid wa rea ca mi thahı khea di rab khwam labak læw khea k rxngreiyn than klang khwam mud thub thamun wa mimi phracea xun dı nxk ca kk phraxngkh than mha brisuththi hæng phraxngkh than thæcring kha phraxngkh pen phu hnung nı hmu phu xthrrm thanghlay
